user_data.target_needs: I wanted comfortable, breathable underwear that would provide full coverage and prevent any discomfort throughout the day.
purchase_reason: I was looking for underwear that would keep me comfortable throughout the day, especially in terms of breathability and fit. The soft fabric and design promised to prevent any discomfort like sagging or bunching, which was a significant concern for me. The emphasis on comfort and the tag-free feature were also appealing, as I wanted something that would feel good against my skin.

I needed a reliable option for everyday wear that would not show under my clothes. The breathable cotton and X-Temp cooling feature were important for my comfort, especially during warmer days. The promise of a no-show look and the value of getting a 6-pack made this choice practical and appealing.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer products that are comfortable, well-made, and true to their descriptions, particularly in terms of fit and color. I value items that offer a good balance of quality and affordability, and I appreciate when products are designed with breathability and softness in mind. Additionally, I tend to favor items that provide a sense of durability and longevity, as well as those that come with a guarantee or promise of quality. On the other hand, I dislike products that have poor quality, such as those that fade quickly or have unpleasant odors. I also find overly snug fits uncomfortable and prefer items that allow for ease of movement and comfort.

conversation.content: I want comfortable, breathable underwear that provides full coverage and prevents discomfort throughout the day. within my expected price range: [10.47, 29.48]
What specific features are you looking for in terms of breathability in the underwear?

I prefer underwear with breathable fabrics that allow for air circulation to keep me feeling fresh and comfortable throughout the day. It's important for me that the fabric is soft and gentle on the skin to prevent any irritation.
What specific fabric materials do you prefer in your underwear to ensure breathability and comfort?

I prefer underwear with breathable fabrics like cotton or modal that allow for air circulation to keep me feeling fresh and comfortable throughout the day. It's important for me that the fabric is soft and gentle on the skin to prevent any irritation.

You'll love the silhouette, styled with hi-cut legs and full-coverage front and back, plus the comfort of no-ride-up leg bands that stay in place. These quality essential panties are made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. This Hanes®-best underwear has a narrow no-pinch logo waistband that's ultra soft for comfort where you need it most. Plus the cotton is preshrunk so the size you buy is the size they stay. These high-cut cotton briefs from Hanes® are available in convenient stock-up 6-packs in assorted colors."] 
Item No.2 : Item Title: <Hanes Women's Panties, Cotton Brief Underwear Multi-Pack (Retired Options)> / Item ID: B0BRJSSTPD / Price: $17.44 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Lingerie Sleep & Lounge', 'Lingerie'] / Description: ["If briefs are your style, you can't do better than Hanes® best lightweight cotton briefs. This comfy brief underwear is made with Hanes® Cool Comfort® fabric that wicks away moisture from your skin to keep you cool and dry all day. Plus these undies are made of ring-spun cotton that's oh so soft against your skin. You'll also appreciate the plush waistband that won't pinch or bind. The silhouette is a classic brief with full coverage in front and back plus a high-rise waist for a sleek, smooth look under clothes. These lightweight briefs have comfort leg bands that stay in place without riding up and are available in a convenient 3-pack of assorted colors. Even better, these classic brief undies are tagless for itch-free comfort."]
